location.address: Computer Deconstruction Lab, Building 9059, 2201 Marconi Road, Wall Township, N.J. 07719, USA

ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then areas of fog and showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy, with a low around 56. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
